ivardefs.name: answerOption_
ivardefs.desc: One of the permitted answers for a "choice" or "open-choice" question.

ivardefs.name: answerValueSet
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a value set containing a list of codes representing permitted answers for a "choice" or "open-choice" question.

ivardefs.name: code_
ivardefs.desc: A terminology code that corresponds to this group or question (e.g. a code from LOINC, which defines many questions and answers).

ivardefs.name: definition
ivardefs.desc: This element is a URI that refers to an [ElementDefinition](elementdefinition.html) that provides information about this item, including information that might otherwise be included in the instance of the Questionnaire resource. A detailed description of

ivardefs.name: enableBehavior
ivardefs.desc: Controls how multiple enableWhen values are interpreted -  whether all or any must be true.

ivardefs.name: enableWhen_
ivardefs.desc: A constraint indicating that this item should only be enabled (displayed/allow answers to be captured) when the specified condition is true.

ivardefs.name: initial_
ivardefs.desc: One or more values that should be pre-populated in the answer when initially rendering the questionnaire for user input.

ivardefs.name: linkId
ivardefs.desc: An identifier that is unique within the Questionnaire allowing linkage to the equivalent item in a QuestionnaireResponse resource.

ivardefs.name: maxLength
ivardefs.desc: The maximum number of characters that are permitted in the answer to be considered a "valid" QuestionnaireResponse.

ivardefs.name: prefix
ivardefs.desc: A short label for a particular group, question or set of display text within the questionnaire used for reference by the individual completing the questionnaire.

ivardefs.name: readOnly
ivardefs.desc: An indication, when true, that the value cannot be changed by a human respondent to the Questionnaire.

ivardefs.name: repeats
ivardefs.desc: An indication, if true, that the item may occur multiple times in the response, collecting multiple answers for questions or multiple sets of answers for groups.

ivardefs.name: required
ivardefs.desc: An indication, if true, that the item must be present in a "completed" QuestionnaireResponse.  If false, the item may be skipped when answering the questionnaire.

ivardefs.name: text
ivardefs.desc: The name of a section, the text of a question or text content for a display item.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: The type of questionnaire item this is - whether text for display, a grouping of other items or a particular type of data to be captured (string, integer, coded choice, etc.).

properties.desc: A particular question, question grouping or display text that is part of the questionnaire.
